Financial service apps featured at Predictive Analytics World, San Francisco

Previous post
Next post

 
 
Tags: CA, Finance, PAW, Predictive Analytics World, San Francisco

Predictive Analytics World for Business in San Francisco, April 3-7, features a full 2-day Financial Services track, featuring experts from Chase, Capital One, Experian, Microsoft, Paypal, and other leading companies. Sign up with code KDN150 & save up to $350.



Preview the Financial Services Track
at PAW San Francisco

Predictive Analytics World for Business in San Francisco
, April 3-7, features a full Financial Services track running through the two-day event. This dedicated track focuses on applications of predictive analytics to the financial industry.



Preview of Financial Services Track at PAW
  • Predicting Startup Success: Finding the Unicorns Among Wildebeests
    Mukund Mohan, Microsoft Strategy


  • Advanced Analytics and the Corporate Audit Function
    Matthew Pietrzykowski, GE and Kemi Olateju, GE Audit

  • Driving the Omnichannel Experience with Predictive Analytics
    Rebecca Pang, CIBC

  • Predictive Analytics @work inside Microsoft: Revenue Modeling & Predictive Maintenance
    Ivan Judson, Microsoft

  • eCommerce Churn - from Definition to Prediction to Reactivation
    Julian Bharadwaj, PayPal

  • How Well Do You Really Know Your Customer?
    Steven Ramirez, Beyond the Arc

  • Q&A: Ask Karl and Steven Anything (about Best Practices - for Financial Services and Beyond)
    Steven Ramirez, Beyond the Arc and Karl Rexer, Rexer Analytics

  • Developing an Analytics Practice and a Science Culture in Insurance
    Clement Brunet, The Co-operators

 



Registration

Sign up with code KDN150 & save up to $350.






PAW Business San Francisco is co-located with

Santa Barbara, CA 93101
